summary: Music encompasses various courses focused on integrating creativity, leadership, and aesthetics into different ecosystems. It is linked to enhancing vision, coding skills, and innovative thinking, often through the lens of musical inspiration and creativity. This includes developing adaptability, fostering boldness, and emphasizing design and beauty in everyday projects for both personal and professional growth.
excerpt: Music-themed courses encourage students to lead with purpose and creativity, broaden their skill sets, and embrace bold, innovative thinking. Focus areas include vision, coding, and design aesthetics.
